body_content.explanation: not needing special knowledge of a particular subject in order to be understood:
examples: When teaching this subject to children, ensure that the untechnical aspects are kept in the foreground.
The contract states the terms and conditions in simple, untechnical language.

body_content.explanation: not good at understanding how computers and other machines work, or at using them:
examples: I'm so untechnical: I'm going to have to ask my friend to set this up for me.
